content.heroIntro:
ALBA SAINA 4 represents an exceptional opportunity in Costa Blanca's most sought-after golf destination. Developed by SCUMAR, a trusted name in quality residential construction, this exclusive collection of contemporary villas brings sophisticated Mediterranean living to Vistabella Golf in Orihuela. Each villa features 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 modern bathrooms, and a generous 95m² of thoughtfully designed living space set on 147m² private plots, with delivery scheduled for December 1st, 2026.

This is more than just a property investment—it's an entry into an established international community where English is widely spoken and sophisticated amenities define daily life. Starting from just €374,900, ALBA SAINA 4 offers remarkable value, positioned 40% below comparable properties in Spanish island markets, while maintaining exceptional build quality and contemporary design standards.

Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean holiday home, a long-term investment with strong rental potential (€800 per week), or a permanent residence in one of Spain's most desirable locations, ALBA SAINA 4 delivers lifestyle and financial security in equal measure.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain. EU citizens, UK residents, and international buyers have equal rights. Most buyers engage a Spanish property lawyer to handle documentation, tax registration (NIE number), and ensure compliance with Spanish property law.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, typical costs include: Stamp duty (6-10%), Notary fees (0.5-1%), Registration fees (0.1%), Legal fees (1-3%), and Valuation. For ALBA SAINA 4 at €374,900, expect approximately €30,000-€45,000 in additional costs. Our team can provide precise estimates.
